title: Man, I sure do enjoy my runes resetting to the "Resolve: The Colossus" page when I log into League
body:
##Every
##_**Single**_
#_**Time**_

___

edit: With patch 7.24 it got fixed, just the client will troll you one more time swapping it to the "Resolve: The Colossus" page cuz it did so when you logged off on patch 7.23

Thanks again Sparkle
